caption.p: Changes in peroxide value (A) and in spectrophotometric indices (K232, B; K270, C) in EVOO samples stored in greenish glass (GG) or tinplate tin (TT) at 6 and 26 °C for 28 (t1), 78 (t2) and 125 days (t3) after packaging. Data are reported as mean ± SD (n = 3). At each sampling time, different letters indicate significant differences among treatments at p < 0.05. The continuous line represents the legal limit for extra virgin olive oil (LL EVOO), whereas the dashed line represents the legal limit for virgin olive oil (LL VOO) according to the EEC/2568/91 Regulation ( EEC, 1991).
